description:
The waterproof-breathable shell and insulated inner layer can be worn separate or zipped together for full storm-fighting power.
Their most advanced thermal-reflective lining combines with synthetic down for efficient warmth while multi-functional pockets and adjustable cuffs, hood, and hem deliver utility and comfort.
name: Columbia Sportswear Stuart Island Interchange Jacket - Big - Mens

specs.value: Matte Face Windbreaker 100% polyester plain weave
